H0.text: what animal represents california. Mountain Lion

H1.text: what animal represents california. Sea Otter

H2.text: what animal represents california. Gray Whale

H3.text: what animal represents california. California grizzly bear

A4.text: The California grizzly bear was designated the official state animal in 1953.

A5.text: The California grizzly bear is one of the state's most visible and enduring symbols, adorning both the state flag and seal.
